name: City Survival
description:
You have to deal with it when the apocalypse comes, kill the scariest one first they are hard to kill and become unstoppable

Stays alert! Kill all those dead zombie apocalypse and become the last lone endless survival. Rebuild your position aim, ready & fire. In this evil of unkilled dead zombies, every single second matters, take a kill shot in the right time will be the variance between an living human or a walking dead.

Features:
-Visually stunning High Quality graphics
-Terrifying sound effects
-Incredibly stunning ghost shooting game for free
-Addictive game play
-Native screen touch controls that are easy to use
-Multiple realistic weapons
-Realistic 3D environment scene
